mapper.select: select id, store.sto_storageNum, storageName, goo_goodsNum, goodsName, storageSum from store, goods, storage where store.goo_goodsNum = goods.goodsNum and sto_storageNum = storageNum

select id, provide.sup_supplierNum, supplierName, goo_goodsNum, goodsName, supplierDate, supplierSum from provide, suppliers, goods where provide.sup_supplierNum = suppliers.supplierNum and provide.goo_goodsNum = goods.goodsNum
select id, sale.emp_workerNum, name, goo_goodsNum, goodsName, saleTime, saleNum from sale, employer, goods where sale.emp_workerNum = employer.workerNum and sale.goo_goodsNum = goods.goodsNum

SELECT ( SELECT SUM(supplierSum) FROM provide WHERE goo_goodsNum = #{goo_goodsNum} ) AS supplySum, ( SELECT SUM(storageSum) FROM store WHERE goo_goodsNum = #{goo_goodsNum} AND sto_storageNum = #{sto_storageNum} ) AS storageSum, ( SELECT SUM(supplierSum) FROM provide WHERE goo_goodsNum = #{goo_goodsNum} ) - ( SELECT SUM(storageSum) FROM store WHERE goo_goodsNum = #{goo_goodsNum} AND sto_storageNum = #{sto_storageNum} ) AS availableNum
